nodes.text: Bunker 2-T5 was one of several bunkers constructed and manned by the Order of Revan on Rishi around 3637 BBY. During the Battle of Rishi, the bunker was assaulted a strike team making their way to the large signal jammer located on the island.
Bunker 2-T5 appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion during the "Battle of Rishi" flashpoint.
